divs: sighting detailsmy question is that i have always wondered about what happened to me and a friend when we where out deerhunting one morning. this would have been in sept.\oct. 1976 and would have been early morning before daylight. we where sitting in the timber sitting against a tree. my friend was sittingabout 30 feet from me when all of a sudden this bright light was shining down upon us and when i looked upit was blinding so i looked away. i never disgused it with him and have lost contact withhim after that. i do not remember what happened otherthan all of a sudden it was daylight and we startedhunting for deer. i do not know what happened for at least that halfhour. i have not had any nightmares or anythingbut just curious if any one else you have had contact with had any experince like this. this happened in missouri about 7 miles south of green city, mo. it was a clear crisp night. i have always wondered about it and actually had forgottenabout it till the last few years when i started watchingthe history channel and then the show on wed. nights.
